Scenario Description: Verify dynamic content loads correctly on the dashboard
Pre Condition: User is logged into the application.
Expected Result: The dashboard should display a summary of loans, announcements, and account health indicators correctly.
Actual Result: The dashboard displayed the loan summary, announcements, and account health indicators correctly.

Steps to Execute: 2. Navigate to the Home Page / Dashboard.
3. Check for the loans summary section.
5. Verify account health indicators are displayed.

Scenario Description: Check if announcements section updates dynamically
Pre Condition: User is logged into the application.
Expected Result: New announcements should appear if they were added during the wait time.

Steps to Execute: 2. Navigate to the Home Page / Dashboard.

Scenario Description: Verify account health indicators are accurate
Pre Condition: User is logged into the application.
Expected Result: Account health indicators should match the user's account status.
Actual Result: Account health indicators matched the actual account data.

Steps to Execute: 2. Navigate to the Home Page / Dashboard.
4. Compare indicators with actual account data.
6. Log out and log back in.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the application.
Expected Result: Quick access links should redirect to the appropriate sections without errors.
Actual Result: All quick access links redirected correctly to their respective sections.

Steps to Execute: 2. Navigate to the Home Page / Dashboard.
3. Click on each quick access link (Loan Application, Payment History, etc.).
5. Return to the dashboard after each click.

Pre Condition: User is logged into the application.
Misc (Comments): Load time is acceptable and meets requirements.

Steps to Execute: 2. Use a stopwatch to time the loading of the Home Page / Dashboard.

Scenario Description: Check for responsive design on mobile devices
Pre Condition: User is logged into the application on a mobile device.
Steps to Execute: 1. Open the loan management application on a mobile device.
Expected Result: Dashboard should be responsive and all elements should be accessible on mobile.

Steps to Execute: 2. Navigate to the Home Page / Dashboard.
3. Rotate the device from portrait to landscape.
4. Check the layout for any misalignment.
